mapper.insert: insert into reply(num, pnum, pgnum, email, content, secret, cdate) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{num}, reply_seq.currval, #{email}, #{content}, #{secret}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM reply where pnum=#{num} order by PGNUM desc)r order by r.num asc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply where pnum=#{num}
